column1: Rosemary and I wish a Happy Thanksgiving to all our friends neighbors and constituents. God Bless America!
Happy Father’s Day and early Happy Birthday to great friend and true patriot @JrzyJoePiscopo! https://t.co/bbUJ8ulOLg
Happy Father’s Day to all fathers and grandfathers. https://t.co/rtuvaQ8c6Y
Proud to endorse @NMalliotakis for Congress. Nicole is dynamic and experienced. She will be a winner for all the people in the Staten Island-Brooklyn Congressional District. https://t.co/s1WqhrFY8u

American Priest is great analysis of life of @NotreDame Pres. Fr. Hesburgh & impact on Catholic higher ed. Written by Fr. Wilson Miscamble book gives credit while raising profound questions-particularly what is role & purpose of Catholic universities in today’s world? Must read! https://t.co/qHW4HWr6wS
Calling on New York Democrats to take stand against left wing progressives after @Amazon disaster. #amazon @NYGovCuomo @NYCMayor https://t.co/0Z5gl1t5Ry https://t.co/SLz4DA1oqQ

Mike Long’s decision to step down as Chairman of @cpnys is a loss for government & politics. Mike has been a true leader & man of unsurpassed integrity & commitment to principle. I am proud to call him my friend & wish him & Eileen continued health & happiness.
